description: Execute functions in a configurable order, modifying a shared data structure.
name: ordu

scripts.build: tsc -d && cp dist/ordu.js dist/ordu.min.js && browserify -o dist/ordu.min.js -e dist/ordu.js -s Ordu -im -i assert -p tinyify
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-web && npm run repo-tag --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.test: lab -L -v -P test -t 100 --sourcemaps --transform node_modules/lab-transform-typescript  -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/coverage.html
scripts.test-web: browserify -o test-web/test-web.js -e test/ordu.test.js -s Ordu -im -i assert -i @hapi/lab && open test-web/index.html
